channel.title: Too many npcs
channel.description:
i just downloaded a file with all of the npcs from runescape in their correct coordinates, compiled, it said no errors, and all of the npcs in my server do not show up. Someone told me that i added too many npcs, and that i exceeded the number aloud in my server. i know there's probably a code somewhere that says like maxnumbernpcs == 800; or something, but it would be cool if somebody could direct me in the right direction. if you can help me please contact me via my messages or msn
msn -- drs023@hotmail.com

item.title: Too many npcs
item.dc:creator: @warrsaw warrsaw
item.description:
@warrsaw wrote:

well something happened and my npcs still aren’t showing up…
msn – drs023@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.title: Too many npcs
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I doubt you’ll have spawned too many tbh. I did the same, apart from mines worked. I had about 6k npc’s…

Read full topic

I’m not 100% sure, but check config.java.

item.title: Too many npcs

item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

Ah yes, Hyperion’s great I hardly ever come across a problem with it, and when I do it’s easily fixable.
As for 508’s+ there pretty good too although there’s a-lot of horrible bugs that come along with them.

item.title: Too many npcs
item.dc:creator: @warrsaw warrsaw
item.description:
@warrsaw wrote:

i didn’t really know how many there were haha, just found an autospawn in some “tools” folder i downloaded off a google link. happened to have pretty much every npcs in the free world zone, and it worked for a couple hours. now whenever i log onto my server, all the npcs are gone/invisible.

Read full topic

item.title: Too many npcs
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Why would you wanna load that many npcs… and if you add over what your client can handle, it will crash.

Read full topic
